document.full_text: chrysler group llc shifted five top executives into new or expanded roles on tuesday, including appointing design chief ralph gilles to take charge of a newly created street and racing technology brand.
document.title: chrysler shuffles executives, creates new brand
lines_and_colors: chrysler group llc shifted five top executives into new or expanded roles on tuesday, including appointing design chief ralph gilles to take charge of a newly created street and racing technology brand.
